General.Name: Shenzhen Silver Basis Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Silver Basis Technology Co., Ltd. provides precision die and molds in China and internationally. The company offers commercial tooling comprising exterior parts, interior trims, function pieces, and security systems; and plastic structural parts, hardware structures, and precision molds, as well as double-shot injection moulds. It also provides flight simulator cockpit and semiconductor equipment. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

3.Name: Ms. Kun  Wang
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
